title: Are the Variables Related?
question_text: Which of the following situations involves two categorical variables that might be related?

choices.text: A high school student's GPA and the student's favorite subject area.
A high school student's grade level and whether the student carries a backpack.
The SAT score of a high school student and the student's ACT score.
The lunch period a high school student eats and the types of books the student enjoys.
The number of hours a high school student sleeps and the number of times the student is tardy to first period.
